Text: Holy John Probably dont have time to respond to the message but hope you are weathering this storm ok Call me if you have some time or need to blow off some steam Bill PSIf you are going to be back east in the spring let me know so we can tee it up at Somerset Hills something tells me you may need a break Esmeralda Avenue San Francisco CA Do You Yahoo Get your free yahoocom address at
